Plot: Time to hassle the Hoff at the rudest, raunchiest television event of the year--The Comedy Central Roast of David Hasselhoff. From running in slo-mo on the beach to inspiring Germany with the power of cheesy pop--it's almost too easy.
Title: Comedy Central Roast of David Hasselhoff
Writer: Ray James, Josh Comers, Anthony Jeselnik, Tom Johnson, David Feldman, Roger Rittenhouse, Steve Rosenfield, Corinne Marshall, Michael Ferrucci, Aaron Lee (additional material), Patrick Meighan (additional material), John Viener (additional material), Jesse Joyce (contributing writer)
Actors: David Hasselhoff, Seth MacFarlane, Whitney Cummings, Jeffrey Ross
